body:
SELECT O.frozenFor, O.U_TGBH, O.U_NG_CODE, O.ItmsGrpCod, O.FirmCode, O.U_Nhom, O.U_DongHH, * FROM FRT_MDM.dbo.OITM AS O WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE O.ItemCode = '$CURSOR$'
SELECT * FROM dbo.tbl_ConfigMDMH_New (NOLOCK) WHERE Nganh = '06' AND Loai = '152' AND Nhan IN ('-1', '381') AND DongHang = '0003'
